intro: Sell shoes. Keep smiling. Try not to cry in the stockroom.
description:
Welcome to the glorious decade of big hair, neon lights, and questionable life choices!
In Shoe Salesman Mania, you play as a slightly worn-out shoe clerk trying to survive another day in retail hell — one sale at a time.

Your mission is simple: sell shoes. Lots of them.
Customers walk in, sit down, and show you — quite literally — what they want.
Run to the right shelf, grab the right pair, and hurry back before they lose patience and storm out.

Each day brings higher sales targets, more demanding customers, and a growing sense that you might never leave this place happy again.
Meet your quota before the store closes, and you’ll live to sell another day.
Fail… and you’re fired.

Features:
- Retro 8-bit visuals inspired by classic arcade charm.
- Time-based gameplay — every second counts when customers get restless.
- Increasing daily goals — from ten pairs a day to pure panic mode.
- High-score board — see how far (and how long) you can last in the world’s toughest shoe store.
- Dry humor, sharp one-liners, and the bittersweet joy of customer service.

Grab your measuring tape, fake your best smile, and step into a hard day’s walk — the most honest retail simulator ever made.
